LanguageData.PS_TooltipGizmoWeapon: {thing}. Left click to equip. Right click to drop.
LanguageData.PS_TooltipGizmoUnarmed: Unarmed. Left click to unequip current weapon.
LanguageData.PS_TooltipSettingCaravan: Caravan unload job will prevent pawns from dropping weapons on arrival.
LanguageData.PS_TooltipSettingCaravanBlacklist: You can add weapons to this blacklist, so they are qualified to be dropped on caravan arrival.
LanguageData.PS_TooltipSettingEquipDelay: Enables a delay on weapon equiping based on the its mass. Also changes the unequiping delay from vanilla RimWorld.
LanguageData.PS_TooltipSettingEquipDelayMultiplier: Equip delay multiplier, in ticks. Delay = Weapon Mass * Multiplier 60 Ticks = 1 Second
LanguageData.PS_TooltipSettingMassCheck: Adds checks on weapon equipping from the floor, to prevent pawns from getting over-encumbered. Doesn't apply to weapons already on pawn inventory.
LanguageData.PS_MessageOverCapacity: {pawn} tried to pick-up and equip {thing}, but they were carrying too much.
